content: **this sock pattern was designed for the sock knitters anonymous group for the march 2023 mystery sock mock it fits the regional techniques challenge ** the inspiration for this pattern is ireland s rich history and aran stitches from the aran islands off the west coast of ireland the pattern is divided into four clues to be released on march 1 8 15 and 22 of 2023 because it is designed as a mystery no photos of the socks are present in any of the clues **you will need ** fingering-weight sock yarn 400-420 m / 100 g - main colour mc 70-100 g - contrast colour cc 15 g needles 2 0 mm and 2 25 mm or size needed to obtain correct gauge tapestry needle and 2 stitch markers optional the pattern is written for magic loop but you can use dpns or 2 circular needles as well **gauge** 32 sts and 44 rds = 10 cm in stockinette after blocking many thanks for test knitting and proofreading to tiinaq /people/tiinaq momofnation /people/momofnation hautecontre /people/hautecontre knittingall /people/knittingall pitsiliina /people/pitsiliina maririi /people/maririi and neuloja80 /people/neuloja80 **follow anna m designs ** facebook https //www facebook com/groups/558717248211397 instagram @annamdesigns
